name: standup-notes
description: Generate daily standup notes for Activation and DaaS squads from GitHub, Slack, Jira, Confluence, and PagerDuty
author: data-engineering-team

plugins.name: atlassian
plugins.description: Atlassian plugin (atlassian@claude-plugins-official) — must be connected to Resonate Jira and Confluence

plugins.name: slack
plugins.description: Slack plugin — must be connected to Resonate Slack workspace
plugins.installHint: Connect Slack via Claude Code settings

plugins.name: pagerduty
plugins.description: PagerDuty MCP server — for incident activity lookups
plugins.installHint: Configure pagerduty MCP server in Claude Code settings

permissions: Read/Write access to PROD Confluence space (standup pages)
Read access to Jira issues (all DE projects)
Read access to Slack channels (team channels)
Read access to PagerDuty incidents and users
Read access to GitHub repos via gh CLI (must be authenticated with `gh auth login`)

arguments.description: Squad to generate notes for: 'activation', 'daas', or 'both' (default: both)
